role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that populates the hosts file with all your web apps configured with the hosts variable
role_description_full_overview: This role is intended to be used with the [main ProfessorManhattan playbook](https://gitlab.com/ProfessorManhattan/Playbooks). It integrates tightly with the configuration variables that come with the playbook.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that populates the hosts file with all your web apps configured with the hosts variable.
